thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Schneider National Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.60

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Schneider National Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.60
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Schneider National Inc:
* SCHNEIDER NATIONAL, INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.33 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.60 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 11 PERCENT TO $1.2 BILLION * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.32 TO $1.44 * SEES FY 2018 NET CAPITAL EXPENDITURES IN RANGE OF $325 MILLION TO $375 MILLION
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.34 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.32, REVENUE VIEW $1.15 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
